naslov: Korčula - (Zavalatica) kuća za odmor u drugom redu do mora (prodaja)
opis: Posredujemo pri prodaji prekrasnog apartmanskog objekta u malom mjestu Zavalatica na otoku Korčuli. Kuća se prostire na 102 m2 stambene površine koje okružuje veliko dvorište površine od 369 m2. Objekt je podijeljen na tri apartmanske jedinice, od toga jedan veliki trosobni apartman u prizemlju ispred kojeg se smjestio veliki bazen, te dva jednosobna apartmana na katu s kojeg se pruža fantastičan pogled na more. U prizemlju se nalazi garaža te vanjsko parking mjesto. Sa sjeverne strane kuće se nalazi grijani bazen od 29 m2 te velika natkrivena terasa sa vanjskim roštiljem. Okućnicu čine stabla masline, razna mediteranska bilja kao lavanda i ružmarin što je tipično za dalmatinsku kuću na otoku. Ovo je jedan izniman objekt, koji iako se nalazi na samo 80 metara do mora pruža svu moguću privatnost. Velika prednost ovog objekta je što sa sjeverne strane kuće je šuma i predio gdje nije građevno te omogućava budućim vlasnicima sav mogući mir i privatnost. Zavalatica je malo otočno mjesto smješteno u  uvali na južnoj strani otoka Korčule, 30 kilometara od grada Korčule. Na samo 2 km od malog gradića Čara smještenog u unutrašnjosti otoka Korčule. Susjedna uvala skriva prekrasnu plažu Žitna sa kristalno čistim morem. U prošlosti je bila poznata kao izvozna vinska luka. Blizina otoka Lastova čini Zavalaticu idealnim polazištem za posjet Lastovu i otočićima u njegovom arhipelagu. Razgled nekretnine moguć je isključivo uz potpisani Ugovor o posredovanju a što je u skladu sa Zakonom o zaštiti podataka i Zakonu o posredovanju u prometu nekretnina. Agencijska provizija je 3% Kontakt: 091/561-5115 ŽELJANA ---------------------------------------------- We are mediating the sale of a beautiful apartment building in the small town of Zavalatica on the island of Korčula. The house covers 102 m2 of living space surrounded by a large yard of 369 m2. The building is divided into three apartment units, of which one large three-bedroom apartment on the ground floor with a large swimming pool in front of it, and two one-bedroom apartments on the first floor with a fantastic view of the sea. On the ground floor there is a garage and an outdoor parking space. On the north side of the house there is a heated swimming pool of 29 m2 and a large covered terrace with an outdoor barbecue. The yard consists of olive trees, various Mediterranean plants such as lavender and rosemary, which is typical for a Dalmatian house on the island. This is an exceptional building, which although located only 80 meters from the sea, offers all possible privacy. The great advantage of this building is that on the north side of the house there is a forest and an area where there is no construction, which provides future owners with all possible peace and privacy. Zavalatica is a small island town located in a bay on the southern side of the island of Korčula, 30 kilometers from the town of Korčula. Only 2 km from the small town of Čara located in the interior of the island of Korčula. The neighboring bay hides the beautiful beach of Žitna with crystal clear waters. In the past, it was known as an export wine port. The proximity of the island of Lastovo makes Zavalatica an ideal starting point for visiting Lastovo and the islands in its archipelago. A property inspection is possible only with a signed Agency Agreement, which is in accordance with the Data Protection Act and the Real Estate Agency Act. The agency fee is 3% Contact: 091/561-5115 ŽELJANA
naziv_agencije: Studio Aura j.d.o.o. Agencija za nekretnine i consulting
